explanation: [0-0] In a room with blue curtains, a man wearing a white T-shirt faces the camera, playing a game on the screen. The game features a little lamb grazing on a green meadow, with a string attached to its body. A pair of hands can be seen beside the string. The game progress is displayed above the lamb.

[0-7] As the game starts, the man shakes the screen with a ferocious expression. The pair of hands on the screen pull the string back and forth, causing the lamb's white wool to gradually fall off and turn black. The lamb becomes angry, and the man stops. Yellow-orange English subtitles appear on the screen, indicating failure. The man looks at the screen angrily.
